data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 1, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Gremio in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 3, Free kick Gremio.
Goal! Gremio have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Luiz Fernando.
Pepe with an assist there.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 9, Coritiba are pushing forward but Matheus Sales's finish is wide of the goal.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Gremio a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Goal! Gremio extend their lead to 2-0 through David Braz.
That's a fine assist from Pepe.
In the minute 13, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Coritiba throw-in in Gremio's half.
Throw-in Gremio.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 17, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Gremio pushes forward through Pepe, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 20, Giovanni Augusto is replacing Guilherme Biro for Coritiba at Arena do Gremio.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
In the minute 22, Coritiba's Robson misses with an attempt on goal.
Gremio have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 24, Ramon Abatti Abel awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Coritiba.
In the minute 25, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Coritiba throw-in in Gremio's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
In the minute 27, Paulo Miranda (Gremio) gets a yellow card.
In Porto Alegre, Robson of Coritiba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 30, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Coritiba's Ramon Martinez has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Ramon Abatti Abel blows against Coritiba's Robson for offside.
In the minute 35, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
In the minute 37, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 40, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Gremio needs to be cautious. Coritiba have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Coritiba.
In the minute 42, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
In Porto Alegre Coritiba attack through William Matheus. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Coritiba at Arena do Gremio.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 45, Coritiba's William Matheus is whistled for offside at Arena do Gremio.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 45, Gremio's Victor Ferraz is on target but unsuccessful.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Gremio.
Coritiba make their second substitution with Neilton replacing Ramon Martinez.
The away team replace Rodolfo with Nathan Silva.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 51, Natanael for the away team is judged to be offside.
Coritiba drive forward but Robson is judged offside.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 52, Ramon Abatti Abel waits before resuming play because Diego Souza for Gremio is still down.
Gremio's Diego Souza looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Neilton of Coritiba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 55, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luiz Fernando of Gremio is pulled up for offside.
Can Gremio capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 59, Throw-in Coritiba.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Gremio defence as Giovanni Augusto fires in a strike for Coritiba.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
William Matheus's header is off-target for Coritiba.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Coritiba drives forward and Giovanni Augusto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In the minute 64, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Maicon is on a sub for Robinho for Gremio.
Guilherme Azevedo is replacing Lucas Silva for the home team.
In the minute 65, Renato Gaucho is making the team's third substitution at Arena do Gremio with Thaciano replacing Luiz Fernando.
Gremio are coming forward and Pepe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Pepe, who is grimacing with pain.
Pepe is back on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 72, Goal! A headed strike from the away team reduces their deficit to 2-1. Nathan Silva got above everyone else to nod it in.
Giovanni Augusto instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 74, Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 80, Gremio's Guilherme Azevedo is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
The home team replace Diego Souza with Isaque.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, The away team have replaced Gabriel Santana with Yan Sasse. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jorginho.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 85, Paulo Miranda (Gremio) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
At Arena do Gremio, Neilton has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in Coritiba.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 87, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 88, Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Coritiba make their fifth substitution with Pablo Thomaz replacing Hugo Moura.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Diogo Barbosa of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Matheus Henrique (Gremio) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a fifth substitution, with Marcelo Oliveira replacing Pepe.
